summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2701 for the improvement of West Dawson Street from California Avenue to Forty-seventh Avenue Southwest and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31747 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
